body: Your instinct for self-preservation gives you many advantages.
name: Uncanny Defense
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Halflings/New Racial Rules/Halfling Feats/Uncanny Defense

sections.body: Cautious Fighter, base attack bonus +3, halfling.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: While fighting defensively or taking the total defense action, you gain a bonus on your Reflex saving throws and to your CMD equal to 1/2 of the dodge bonus to AC you gained from taking that action.
sections.name: Benefit
